title: The Best Revenge
description: GETTING BACK AT THE BUM!Physical therapist Alexa Shaw definitely had a score to settle with Ryan Cassidy, the thoughtless jerk who'd dumped her two years before. But for now she was willing to keep quiet, because her latest patient was Ryan's young daughter--a child he'd conveniently forgotten to even mention during his dating days with Alexa!Spending time around daughter meant that Alexa also had to keep running into Daddy. Sure, Ryan was the best-looking thing in tight jeans that she'd ever seen, but he was crazy if he thought she'd come crawling back to him. No, this time it was Ryan's turn to crawl!HEAT UP YOUR WINTER: These sinfully sexy men are almost too hot to handle!
author: Barbara Boswell
